name: At Home Tonight
description:
The Game

At Home Tonight is a new interactive fiction game. You play as a Female-Player who wakes up in her bedroom being stared upon by 5 figures who are apparently all your friends and you're in a sleepover. It is currently in development. The full game is a mystery as to how many chapters there will be.

The Story

You wake in your room with no recollection and 5 figures staring down at you. Then you recognize one of them as your Best Friend and the rest are a bit hazy but, apparently, you're at a sleepover and fainted from tiredness. Well, that was weird but time to make the most of it and have fun at this sleepover!

Or......So, you thought. When your 'memory' begins to have holes in it and your friends start acting strange, disappearing, and...getting murdered...Will you survive? Still, be able to find and stay with your love/or best friend? The thing is...

You know who did it, but how will you fix it, survive, and/or protect?

Key Features

✦ Create a semi-customizable player character, selecting:

  • Looks {choices such as hair and skin, as well as eyes.}

✦Find a Special Connection...

  • Such as a romance with a Fruit Boy or go Platonic with our lovely Aiz!

The Main Cast

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Aiz-

Your best friend and the one you only really remember. At what cost will she go to protect the both of you and...How much does she truly know? *Platonic Route*

Ro's: BlueBerry-

Sweet and calm he seems to stutter a lot and it's as if he's trying to bring comfort? What does he know....Why does he know?

Lemon-

Cocky yet, sour he seems to always mutter about destroying something or....running? What happened to him....Why is he so...strange?

Raspberry-

Charming but...sweetly eerie, he seems to always 'jumpscare' you and lead the boys....? What is he hiding.....Why is he hiding it?

Strawberry-

Egotistic while being shockingly silent, he seems to always brag about himself...or trying to protect the gang?....What is he protecting us from....Why is he protecting us?
